title: Administration of oaths
context: [PART III. GENERAL PROVISIONS] [ยง338-51] Administration of oaths. Regular employees in the research and statistics office of the department of health may be appointed by the director of health to administer the oaths required by this chapter to be taken when registering vital events on a delayed basis and when correcting items on vital records registered under this chapter. [L 1975, c 62, ยง1]
